original: Kusalaṁ atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naatītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam atīta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na atīta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Kusalaṁ anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: kusalam anāgata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na anāgata ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Kusalaṁ paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo napaccuppannārammaṇo dhammo
analyzed: kusalam paccuppanna ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na paccuppanna ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe aññamaññe
tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava
